Release.Notes: * Reorganized main menu into groups * Added "New Sub-Case" button (to create a sub case of the current case) * Disabled FreeMind Import feature, since it's not quite ready yet
* Added Seach History for filter page (remembers your last 20 filters) * UI Enhancement - disabled buttons are now grey
* Added Pause button (stops the clock while you're away) * Auto version update from now on
* Auto-update checks for new version every hour
